title: Aavegotchi merchandise
body:
Introduce an option for personalised merchandise (for example a hoodie) with owned Aavegotchi printed on it.

This should be reasonably priced (adjusted to GHST price, for example 50 USD). currently at 75 GHST.

A margin can be added and profits can be added to the DAO Treasury.

By introducing built-in merchandise personalised to the users request, payed for in the local currency:

- will create a Unique clothing item acting as a great advertisement
- will add funds to the DAO Treasury
author: 0x12668165569DeFFA1a556B1A5220F799e727f23D
